segments.text: I notice the open window and the calm garden outside, and it’s such a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s actually kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and it’s making me a little nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the girl is just standing there, looking so hopeful for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be in for a big surprise when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but it’s also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she does before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
